summary:
Nintendo is a Japanese video game company that makes games and consoles. It started in 1889, making playing cards. In the 1970s, they moved into video games and released their first console. Nintendo became famous with games like Donkey Kong and Super Mario Bros.

They've made many popular consoles, such as the Game Boy and Wii, and created well-known characters like Mario, Donkey Kong, and Link. Nintendo has sold billions of games and is one of Japan's most successful companies, with many awards for its technology and games.
title: Nintendo
